pr_title: Elasticsearch exporter: limit the memory size of a bulk

timeline.bodyText: (Optional) Maybe also add a lower boundary; in case someone enters 10 in the configuration thinking it will be 10 MB
timeline.author: pihme

replies.bodyText: That would be an option 👍  But I think it is not necessary because a lower value doesn't break anything. It is also documented and has the default value in the templates.
replies.author: saig0

timeline.message:
fix(exporters/elasticsearch-exporter): limit the memory size of a bulk

* new configuration to limit the memory size of the bulk before flushing it, default is 10 MB
* new metric for the bulk memory size
* adjust documentation and configuration templates
